SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.models.map

Class Country

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.models.map.Country
public class Country extends Object
Represents a country in a world map. Each country has an index, ID, parent continent, neighbors, number of armies, and coordinates for GUI display.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Tejasvi, Kapil

  • Constructor Details

    • Country

      public Country()
      Set Country object with default values.

    • Country

      public Country(String p_countryId, String p_parentContinent)
      Create Country Constructor with values in argument parameters and set defaults for the rest.
      Parameters:
      p_countryId - ID of the country
      p_parentContinent - Name of the continent in which this country belongs

    • Country

      public Country(String p_countryFileIndex, String p_countryId, String p_parentContinent, String p_xCoordinate, String p_yCoordinate, GameMap p_gameMap)
      Creates Country object having more arguments This constructor used while reading from ".map" files.
      Parameters:
      p_countryFileIndex - index in map file
      p_countryId - ID of the Country
      p_parentContinent - Index of the parent Continent of the country
      p_xCoordinate - X-coordinate of the Country for GUI
      p_yCoordinate - Y-coordinate of the Country for GUI
      p_gameMap - Map object in which country is present
